channel.title: Redis on chi's handbook
channel.description: Recent content in Redis on chi's handbook

item.title: Common commands
item.description: Redis common commands # Database # DBSIZE # DBSIZE Return the number of keys in the currently-selected database. see also redis.io. FLUSHALL # FLUSHALL [ASYNC | SYNC] Remove all keys from all database. see also redis.io. FLUSHDB # FLUSHDB [ASYNC | SYNC] Remove all keys from the current database. see also redis.io. SELECT # SELECT index Change the selected database for the current connection. see also redis.io. Key # KEYS # KEYS pattern Returns all keys matchingÂ pattern.
